personal.summary: Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications across frontend, backend, and databases. I specialize in React, Angular, Node.js, and REST APIs, delivering clean, maintainable, production-ready systems used at scale. I own features end-to-end ‚Äî from UI/UX implementation to backend architecture, API optimization, and database design. Focused on performance, reliability, and long-term maintainability.

projects.title: OLA ONDC Grocery & Food Delivery
projects.description: Progressive Web App for ONDC-based food & grocery delivery with 20-30 min delivery, scheduled orders, unified search, and optimized performance across devices.

details.challenge: Migrating OLA's grocery offerings to the ONDC framework while maintaining sub-30 minute delivery expectations and ensuring a high-performance PWA experience for millions of users.
details.solution: Architected a Vue.js based PWA that integrated directly with ONDC protocols. Implemented batch data loading and pixel-perfect UI components from Figma to ensure fluid navigation and fast TTI (Time to Interactive).
outcomes: Successfully launched ONDC grocery across major Indian metros.
Handled thousands of concurrent users with sub-second page transitions.
Reduced frontend load times by 40% through code splitting and asset optimization.

projects.impact: Serving thousands of users with fast delivery experience and seamless ONDC integration

projects.title: Sunbird ED - National LMS Platform
projects.description: Nation-scale Learning Management System supporting millions of learners across India through Diksha platform.
features: Scalable architecture for millions of users

details.challenge: Scaling a national learning platform to support varied internet speeds and diverse devices across India while transitioning from hardcoded logic to a flexible, adopter-friendly framework.
details.solution: Engineered framework-agnostic 'Building Blocks' using Angular 12 and Node.js. Developed the Sunbird ED Portal with a focus on modularity, allowing different adopters (like Diksha) to seamlessly integrate and customize the LMS.
outcomes: Platform currently serves millions of students nationwide.
Achieved high code reliability through 80%+ test coverage with Jest.
Improved platform stability during peak usage hours (exam seasons).

projects.impact: Supporting education for millions of students across India

projects.title: Healthcare LMS - Aastrika Foundation
projects.description: Healthcare Learning Management System delivering training programs across Bihar, UP, MP, and other states.

details.challenge: Creating an accessible training platform for healthcare workers in rural areas with limited connectivity, requiring offline support and verifiable certification.
details.solution: Built a robust React/Node.js application with MongoDB. Developed an automated certificate generation engine and a progress tracking system that works reliably across 4+ Indian states.
outcomes: Empowered thousands of healthcare workers with digital training.
Streamlined the certification process for multi-state government programs.
Enhanced tracking for health department administrators.

projects.impact: Training healthcare workers across multiple Indian states

publications.title: Disease Prediction by Machine Learning with the help of Big Data from Healthcare Communities
